info.title: Thesaurus Terms API - Type of Organisms
info.description: API for retrieving terms related to different types of organisms from the thesaurus.

get.description: Retrieve terms related to various organism types, including detailed descriptions and multilingual titles.

200.description: A list of terms related to types of organisms, such as Animals

example.name: Animals
example.description: Animals are a major group of organisms, classified as the kingdom Animalia or Metazoa...

longDescription.en: Animals are a major group of organisms, classified as the kingdom Animalia or Metazoa...
longDescription.es: Los animales son el grupo más importante de organismos...
longDescription.fr: Les animaux constituent un des principaux groupes d'organismes...
longDescription.ar: تمثل الحيوانات مجموعة رئيسية من الكائنات الحية...
longDescription.zh: 动物是主要的生物体群体...
